ygData.subject: quests
ygData.msgSnippet: the quest to kill arlena for grimrot is apparently the quest for the electrum bladed wakizashi, a fairly nice 1hs weapon.. so dont give up hope too early. i ve
ygData.messageBody:
the quest to kill arlena for grimrot is apparently the quest for the
electrum bladed wakizashi, a fairly nice 1hs weapon.. so dont give up
hope too early.

i've also petitioned/bugged/emailed the groflah bug (and the fact that
lady shae in fp NEVER, EVER has her quest item) many times. i've also
bugged the ludicrously weak quest rewards from the neriak quests. no,
i'm not going to spend 12 hours and risk my neck obtaining the materials
for the kerra isle beetle eye and tusk quest, get an impart strength
scroll, and remain satisfied.

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
